title: ABOUT US
heading: We provide innovation and support for agriculture
text:
Kaleb Service We are a company involved in the import and distribution of Agricultural machinery, implements and inputs and trucks and buses, training center for agriculture machinery operators and the export of agricultural commodities like sesame, pulses and coffee.
Import of agriculture machinery like combine harvesters, mowers, balers, tractors exclusively representing word renowned CLAAS agriculture machinery from Germany in ET.
We are importing agriculture implements like plows, harrow, planters, seed drill, land leveller etc .. we are representing BALDAN from Brazil exclusively.
We are importing and distributing agricultural chemical sprayer knapsack, tractor mounted, tractor trailed, self-propelled etc., we are representing JACTO from Brazil exclusively.
